{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=Mesh3 |revision=f (Nova MW3) |series=AC1200 |asin=B07DFQGP1K |fcc_date=05/02/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=V7TMESH3F |ic_id=9034A-MESH3F |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FNT;RTL8197FNT, GAJ62P5 GH08E4; |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64VSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FNT |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FNT;RTL8197FNT, GAJ62P5 GH08E4; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BRH;RTL8812BRH, H8D86E1 GH40N; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Tenda_XXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |oui=E8:65:D4 |oui_eth=E8:65:D4 |pcb_id=10036287 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tendacn.com/en/product/MW3.html}} "10036287" and "V1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *Web GUI: http://tendawifi.com ===Reviews=== *[https://weblance.com.ua/386-obzor-besprovodnoy-sistemy-tenda-nova-mw3-chast-1-vneshniy-vid-dizayn-harakteristiki-vozmozhnosti-realnaya-ekspluataciya.html ''Tenda Nova MW3'' Review on '''WebLance'''] ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems#Tenda Nova]] *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5s)|Tenda Mesh5s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5S (2018-07-20) *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5)|Tenda Mesh5]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5 (2018-07-19) *[[Tenda Mesh3-18 (Nova MW6 2018)|Tenda Mesh3s-18]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3-18 (2018-05-09) *[[Tenda Mesh3f (Nova MW3)|Tenda Mesh3f]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3F (2018-05-02) *[[Tenda Mesh3s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3S (2018-01-24) *[[Tenda Nova MW6 (Mesh3)|Tenda Mesh3]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3 (2017-08-23) __NOTOC__
